title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: Lesson Plans & Teacher Guides
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials     Lesson Plans & Teacher Guides                Lesson Plans & Teacher Guides       Link to Teaching with Historic Places "Collision of Cultures" (Click here to open).  "Comparing and Contrasting Creek and Cherokee Indians" - 2nd Grade "Battle of Horseshoe Bend" - 2nd Grade "The Five Regions of Alabama" - 4th Grade Four Native American Tribes and Daily Lives - 4th Grade National Security and the Creek War - 10th Grade Battle of Horseshoe Bend - Compiled Secondary Five Day Lesson Plan - English/Language Arts Understanding Treaties - Compiled Secondary
